readable.title: 2815256108_fc1302117d
readable.content: Two men are standing beside a sign that says " Jesus or hell " . Two men are standing in front of a protest sign resting on a red electric box . Two men are talking on the street ; one is pointing at a sign that says " Jesus or Hell " beneath a red box , and the other is standing there listening . Two men discuss a sign that says " Jesus or Hell " . Two men talking by a red box and a poster
